**How to play: **

Drag dice onto the White Squares onto the Ship.

Not all Squares need to be filled.

Once you're satisfied, you can press GO on the cup on the left.

It'l do each action one at a time and then pass turn to the Enemy AI.

Goal of the game is to see how many levels can you pass while managing enemies and your Dice economy.

Thank you for visiting my Game Jam Game. This game was made for GMTK 2022 Game Jam.

The theme of this jam is: Roll of the Dice.

Dicey Situations: Pirate's Dice is a Strategy Dice Management Game. You manage your ship with Dices as well as handling various stats that need to be looked after.

There are 3 different types of dices: Regular, Red, Purple. Red controls the ships moral, Purple controls curses. If you don't use those dices you take damage based on the number its rolled on.

There's no penalty in using any dices.

Using the Trash/Heal option (Top Square) will get rid of dices as well as heal the ship depending on Type.

Regular - Hives Health

Red - Increase Moral

Purple - Lowers Curses

Each time you Destroy an enemy ship, you progress through the level.

Each level will increase the number of enemies.

More enemies, more dices, more challenging.

This is a game where you not only manage what's on the board but as well as  what is in front of you when you roll your dices. Good luck and have fun!

Disclaimer: This is a Game Jam game, there will be bugs/unpolishedness/etc. Enjoy the game for what it is and don't take it too seriously. Have fun and thanks for swinging by!
